column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Seared Spanish Sausages- my favorite tapa we got
column2: hands down.  You get 4 different kinds of sausages and each are delicious and unique.  It comes with a dipping sauce which
column3: at the risk of sounding like a pretentious foodie
column4: basically tasted like mayo.  But no worries
column5: sausage needs no dipping sauce in my world!  Even taking into consideration my intense love for sausages of any kind (from bratwurst to chorizo and back)
column6: this plate pleased my non-sausage obsessed dinner mates just as much.
